item.title: Plane crashes into parked aircraft while landing at airport, sparking fire
item.description: A small plane landing at a Montana airport has crashed into aircraft on the ground, causing a large fire but no serious injuries

item.title: FIFA moves ahead with new human rights strategy for World Cup games, but advocates are skeptical
item.description: FIFA is testing a new protocol for the 2026 World Cup in North America, requiring host committees to develop human rights action plans

item.title: 'What is happening?' Milwaukee area recovers from record rain and flooding
item.description: The Milwaukee area is drying out after weekend rain hits unofficial state records
